description: Sahou no Terra is a member of God`s Right Seat. Blessed with the nature of God`s Medicine (Raphael). A small, menacing-looking old man wearing a green robe. Touma and Itsuwa encountered him when they went to France. He uses the spell Execution of Light, which can manipulate the hierarchy of everything around him. He also uses a guillotine made of flour, a byproduct of the Execution of Light spell. It seems that he knew something about Touma`s Imagine Breaker, but it was never revealed. He also learns of his memory loss during a fight with him. He is later killed by Acqua near the end of the 14th novel.
name: Sahou no Terra
